title: Hospitals don't burn down
creator_credit: Brian Trenchard-Smith, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: A disturbingly realistic film about a fire in a high-rise hospital. It dramatically portrays the horror and awful consequences of such a tragedy. Demonstrates the results of good and bad training and the need for all personnel to learn basic drills and routines in case of fire. Cast includes Jeanne Drynan, Mark Edwards, Ray Marshall, Ralph Cotterill, Ken Goodlet.
